Text.val: 13.05.2011 SH SCR16448 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
07.05.2011 GB SCR16396 Changed value of the parameter BAD491.PI.HOFF_CODE in the 1. Preparations
08.01.2007 SH SCR12217 Part3 Fixed bug with calc of group Factorlink facility;
Part 10 Changed selection to calc income banktransfers
20.12.2006 SH SCR12186 Set BAD490.PO.DEBTORSADMIN = 0 after call of BAD491 if
19.12.2006 SH SCR12186 Part2: Extended update of BAD491.PI.SALESYEARGROUP
Part3: Changed update of BAD491.GROUPFACILITY; Part4 Added test to perform modul
28.11.2006 SH SCR12071 Part10. Changed calc of v.PI.INCOMEBANKTRANSFERS
20.11.2006 SH SCR12071 Part 3. Changed update of v.Group_ARRANGEMENTFACILITY
-- 9. Insurance costs (only remark, nothing has to be calculated)
-- Finally call BAD491 to calculate the costs
... if v.PI.UNIT <> CA / CB check history for proper unit
... if still <> CA / CB set hardcoded "CB"
@The calculation of PI.NOM supports only a 12 month period
... number of month if PI.DATEFROM / PI.DATEUNTIL are inside the same year
... number of month if PI.DATEFROM / PI.DATEUNTIL not inside the same year
... dynamically usage of select part in DSQL statement to calc the sales

SQL_STMT_U.val: select CMON_ADMNO, CMON_CLNTNO, count(*), cast (sum (:7) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CMON, :1/CLNT where CMON_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CMON_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and CLNT103_COMM_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT103_COMM_CLNTNO = :3 and concat(DIGITS(CMON_YEAR), DIGITS(CMON_MONTH)) between :4 and :5 and CMON_CURRENCY = ':6' group by CMON_ADMNO, CMON_CLNTNO order by CMON_ADMNO, CMON_CLNTNO for fetch only

Text.val: -- In case of client was the hole year active

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum (:7) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CMON where CMON_ADMNO = :2 and CMON_CLNTNO = :3 and concat(DIGITS(CMON_YEAR), DIGITS(CMON_MONTH)) between :4 and :5 and CMON_CURRENCY = ':6' for fetch only

select count(*) from :1/SCHT where SCHT_ADMNO = :2 and SCHT_CLNTNO = :3 and SCHT_SCHEDDATERECV between ':4' and ':5' and SCHT_ADDTOSALES = 'Y' and SCHT_BOOKED = 'Y' and SCHT_AUTOMATIC = 'N' for fetch only

select count(*) from :1/SCHT where SCHT_ADMNO = :2 and SCHT_CLNTNO = :3 and SCHT_SCHEDDATERECV between ':4' and ':5' and SCHT_ADDTOSALES = 'Y' and SCHT_BOOKED = 'Y' and SCHT_AUTOMATIC = 'Y' for fetch only

Text.val: -- variables uses to calc the group facility

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum (CDEP_ACTUALAMOUNTHELL) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CDEP where CDEP_ADMNO = :2 and CDEP_CLNTNO = :3 and CDEP_TYPE = 3 and CDEP_DATEDELETED is null and CDEP_PURPOSE = 8 for fetch only

select cast (sum (CDEP_ACTUALAMOUNTHELL) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CDEP where CDEP_ADMNO = :2 and CDEP_CLNTNO = :3 and CDEP_TYPE = 3 and CDEP_DATEDELETED is null and CDEP_PURPOSE in (3,4,5,6,7) for fetch only
select cast (sum (CDEP_ACTUALAMOUNTHELL) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CDEP where CDEP_ADMNO = :2 and CDEP_CLNTNO = :3 and CDEP_TYPE = 3 and CDEP_DATEDELETED is null and CDEP_PURPOSE = 2 for fetch only

select cast (sum (CDEP_ACTUALAMOUNTHELL) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CDEP where CDEP_ADMNO = :2 and CDEP_CLNTNO = :3 and CDEP_TYPE = 3 and CDEP_DATEDELETED is null and CDEP_PURPOSE not in (2,3,4,5,6,7,8) for fetch only

select cast (sum (CDEP_ACTUALAMOUNTHELL) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CDEP, :1/CLNT where CDEP_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CDEP_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and CDEP_TYPE = 3 and CDEP_DATEDELETED is null and CDEP_PURPOSE = 8 and CLNT103_COMM_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT103_COMM_CLNTNO = :3 for fetch only

select cast (sum (CDEP_ACTUALAMOUNTHELL) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CDEP, :1/CLNT where CDEP_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CDEP_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and CDEP_TYPE = 3 and CDEP_DATEDELETED is null and CDEP_PURPOSE in (3,4,5,6,7) and CLNT103_COMM_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT103_COMM_CLNTNO = :3 for fetch only

select cast (sum (CDTO_CURRBALSTOCKFACILITY) as decimal (13,2)), cast (sum (CDTO_CURRBALFACTACC) as decimal (13,2)), cast (sum (CDTO_CURRBALRETENTIONACC) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CDTO, :1/CLNT where CDTO_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CDTO_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and CDTO_DATE = ':4' and CLNT103_COMM_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT103_COMM_CLNTNO = :3 for fetch only

select cast (sum (CDEP_ACTUALAMOUNTHELL) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CDEP, :1/CLNT where CDEP_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CDEP_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and CDEP_TYPE = 3 and CDEP_DATEDELETED is null and CDEP_PURPOSE = 2 and CLNT103_COMM_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT103_COMM_CLNTNO = :3 for fetch only

select cast (sum (CDEP_ACTUALAMOUNTHELL) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CDEP, :1/CLNT where CDEP_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CDEP_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and CDEP_TYPE = 3 and CDEP_DATEDELETED is null and CDEP_PURPOSE not in (2,3,4,5,6,7,8) and CLNT103_COMM_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT103_COMM_CLNTNO = :3 for fetch only

select cast(sum (CMON_NNEWDEBTORSMAN) as decimal(9)), cast(sum (CMON_NNEWDEBTORSAUTO) as decimal(9)), cast(sum (CMON_TOTNDEBTNOTESNEWMAN + CMON_TOTNCREDNOTESNEWMAN) as decimal(9)), cast(sum (CMON_TOTNDEBTNOTESNEWAUTO + CMON_TOTNCREDNOTESNEWAUTO) as decimal(9)), cast(sum (CMON_TOTNPAYMAN) as decimal(9)), cast(sum (CMON_TOTNPAYAUTO) as decimal(9)) from :1/CMON where CMON_ADMNO = :2 and CMON_CLNTNO = :3 and concat(DIGITS(CMON_YEAR), DIGITS(CMON_MONTH)) between :4 and :5 and CMON_CURRENCY = ':6' for fetch only

select cast (sum (CMOC_NDUNNINGLETTERSAUTO) as decimal (9)), cast (sum (CMOC_NDUNNINGLETTERSMAN) as decimal (9)), cast (sum (CMOC_NDUNNINGPHONECALLS) as decimal (9)) from :1/CMOC where CMOC_ADMNO = :2 and CMOC_CLNTNO = :3 and concat(DIGITS(CMOC_YEAR), DIGITS(CMOC_MONTH)) between :4 and :5 and CMOC_CURRENCY = ':6' and CMOC_COUNTRY = ':7' for fetch only

select cast (sum (CMOC_NDUNNINGLETTERSAUTO) as decimal (9)), cast (sum (CMOC_NDUNNINGLETTERSMAN) as decimal (9)), cast (sum (CMOC_NDUNNINGPHONECALLS) as decimal (9)) from :1/CMOC where CMOC_ADMNO = :2 and CMOC_CLNTNO = :3 and concat(DIGITS(CMOC_YEAR), DIGITS(CMOC_MONTH)) between :4 and :5 and CMOC_CURRENCY = ':6' and CMOC_COUNTRY <> ':7' and CMOC_COUNTRY in (select CTRY_COUNTRY from :1/CTRY where CTRY_COMMISSIONGROUP = ':8') for fetch only

select cast (avg (CMON_TOTNCREDLIMOUT) as decimal (9)) from :1/CMON where CMON_ADMNO = :2 and CMON_CLNTNO = :3 and concat(DIGITS(CMON_YEAR), DIGITS(CMON_MONTH)) between :4 and :5 and CMON_CURRENCY = ':6' for fetch only

select cast (sum (CMOC_TOTSALDEBTNOTESMAN + CMOC_TOTSALDEBTNOTESAUTO - CMOC_TOTSALCREDNOTESMAN - CMOC_TOTSALCREDNOTESAUTO) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CMOC where CMOC_ADMNO = :2 and CMOC_CLNTNO = :3 and concat(DIGITS(CMOC_YEAR), DIGITS(CMOC_MONTH)) between :4 and :5 and CMOC_CURRENCY = ':6' and CMOC_COUNTRY in (select CCRY308_COUNTRY from :1/CCRY where CCRY308_ADMNO = CMOC_ADMNO and CCRY308_CLNTNO = CMOC_CLNTNO and CCRY501_DEBTORSRISK = 'Y' and CCRY501_REINSCLNT_INFS_CODE = '') for fetch only

select cast (sum (CMON_NCREDLIMREQ + CMON_NCREDLIMREQU) as decimal (9)) from :1/CMON where CMON_ADMNO = :2 and CMON_CLNTNO = :3 and concat(DIGITS(CMON_YEAR), DIGITS(CMON_MONTH)) between :4 and :5 and CMON_CURRENCY = ':6' for fetch only

select cast (sum (CMON_NCREDLIMPROLONG) as decimal (9)) from :1/CMON where CMON_ADMNO = :2 and CMON_CLNTNO = :3 and concat(DIGITS(CMON_YEAR), DIGITS(CMON_MONTH)) between :4 and :5 and CMON_CURRENCY = ':6' for fetch only

select cast (sum (LGCC_AMOUNTH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/LGCC, :1/LDGR where LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO = :2 and LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO =:3 and LGCC_DATE between ':4' and ':5' and LDGR_ADMNO = LGCC_LGCD_ADMNO and LDGR_NO = LGCC_LDGR_NO and LDGR_INCOMETYPEVORTEX = 9 for fetch only
